attributes.action: prohibit the sale of saucepans with metal handles, and orchestrate a nationwide removal of all such pans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A cause for anyone who has ever been burnt by a saucepan with a metal handle. They are dangerous, scientifically flawed and wholly unnecessary. 

We already have tried and tested alternatives; namely wood and plastic, that pose much less of a health & safety risk compared to metal, a highly conductive material.
